title: Pixel 3xl has been restarting itself over for 2 hours, held power button for 30 seconds, no response
content: Pixel 3xl has been restarting itself over for 2 hours, held power button for 30 seconds, no response, held power button and the volume buttons and says system locked and the other way has an android character with error saying "no command, please help!  it is still on loop restart, holding down buttons from forums has not worked.
